name: Projectile Trajectory Preview
contentText: Projectiles Trajectory Preview is a mod that lets you see where your projectiles are gonna land. It works for all vanilla-projectiles such as arrows, ender pearls, snowballs and tridents.

name: Fresh Loot Highlight
contentText: Fresh Loot Highlight is a mod that tells you what items you've picked up and highlights them in the inventory.

name: Better Compass
contentText: Better Compass adds a vanilla-style compass ribon to the HUD. It can even show the direction to your last death's location.

name: Banner Hats
contentText: Banner Hats lets you equip banner in the helmet slot, just like pillagers do.

name: Mini Drift
contentText: Mini Drift is a small racing game made with Unity. Drift as far as you can on endless roads while avoiding obstacles, collect bolts, buy new awesome cars and become the best drifter!

name: Flappy Fish Wear
contentText: Flappy Fish Wear is a wear os game made with Android Studio. You play as a fish and you have to avoid pipes to go as far as you can.

name: Minecraft Recreation
contentText: This project tries to recreate a barebone version of Minecraft using rasterization. Unlike most other Minecraft 3D projects on Scratch, it's not raycasting, so it supports entities and it's textured.

name: 3D Engine
contentText: This project is a 3D engine. You can import .obj files (from inside the code) and move everything how you want. It relies on Painter's algorithm and supports some great graphic features such as flat shading and multiple lights.

name: Path-tracer
contentText: Raytracing is a well known features to get realistic lightning in modern video games, this is pathtracing, even more realistic, but at the cost of speed.
